Tolkien-related events that took place in 1909.

content.title: January
content.content: 29 - Richard E. Blackwelder, Tolkien collector, is born.

content.title: June
content.content: 10 - Around this date J.R.R. Tolkien composes the Book of the Foxrook.

content.title: August
content.content: 20 - Andr√© Morell, who would play Elrond in The Lord of the Rings (1978 film), is born.

content.title: Autumn
content.content:
Father Morgan discovers the romance between J.R.R. Tolkien and Edith Bratt, which he fears may lead to early marriage and ruin Tolkien's career prospects.
Tolkien fails to win an Oxford scholarship.

? - Elaine Griffiths, friend and pupil of J.R.R. Tolkien, is born.
Years
